pageContext.title: Music Encoding Conference
pageContext.description_excerpt: Music encoding is a critical component of the emerging fields of digital musicology, digital editions, symbolic music information retrieval, and others. At the centre of these fields, the Music Encoding Conference has emerged as an important cross-disciplinary venue for theorists, musicologists, librarians, and technologists to meet and discuss new advances in their fields. The theme of the 2018 Music Encoding Conference is "Encoding and Performance," and will explore the relationship between music encoding and performance practice.
